DESCRIPTION: Change forms, transforming all cards with #yShift.
#ySpell: Damage. Deals 10 [13] damage to the farthest right enemy.
Deals 10 [13] damage to the farthest left enemy.
Upon losing HP, loses #yStrength equal to HP lost until the end of the turn. NL Decreases by #b1 when used, and is halved rounding down at the end of the turn.
Costs 0 if you have #yShapeshifted this turn.
The specified value scales with #yFocus, rather than #yStrength or #yDexterity.
